<NEW>

OOC - this post is being done =
under the assumption that since Hydras is the combined spark of Beast Wars =
Megatron and Galvatron, it would not explicitly register as Megatron's, but=
 different.  And since VICE GRIP is not a technician nor does he have a lar=
ge scale sensor net, I'm assuming he won't be able to tell such a delicate =
scan.  If I'm incorrectin assuming this, just say so and before responding =
to the post I will consider it 'voided' and as such will rewrite at a later=
 date!  So, just say so if I misresponded and I'll assume the post didn't h=
appen and will rewrite!

<IN CHARACTER>

At this point, DINOBOT merely smir=
ked over at HYDRAS, "Yes, I suppose one would say you are Megatron."

And t=
hen VICE GRIP brought out his scanners, hissing over at INFERNO, "I know no=
t who you are, but on CYBERTRON we Predacons fought for the destruction of =
the system, and the Megatron I knew would be LOATHE to make himself the roy=
alty!"  A bit far off, perhaps.

At this point, VICE GRIP went over to poin=
t his scanners at HYDRAS, but his records of MEGATRON being two time travel=
s, two spark bindings, and the numerous other alterations MEGATRON had unde=
rgonpe in the BEAST WARS made MEGATRON's far different than the leader's sp=
ark he had instilled on Cybertron.

VICE GRIP hissed, "It reads FALSE.  Now=
, I suggest you explain what MAXIMAL trick this is before I am forced to ge=
t angry wtih you all."

DINOBOT casually walking over towards VICE GRIP, "S=
hall I deal with the bufoon for you, LORD HYDRAS?"
